title: Stool, ca. 1955–60
medium: Laminated amendoim and imbuia, tubular metal
creditline: Gift of Evan Snyderman and Zesty Meyers of R 20th Century and museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment
description: Curving rectangular seat having low, slightly upturned back with angled sides and large central opening; constructed of long laminated strips of Brazilian hardwoods in tones of dark to medium brown; mounted on black, slim cylindrical metal frame with four splayed legs.

exhibitions.title: Looking Forward/ Looking Back: Recent Acquisitions in 20th- and 21st-Century Design

tombstone.epitaph:
Stool, ca. 1955–60.
ca. 1955–60. Laminated amendoim and imbuia, tubular metal. Gift of Evan Snyderman and Zesty Meyers of R 20th Century and museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment. 2004-17-1.
